security: Information about individuals and pre-inductees is considered personally identifiable information and is restricted. Releasing this information could violate privacy.
summary: An agent report summarizing the employment history of Robert Scheer at S. Klein Department Stores in 1954, including his position, salary, and reason for leaving, as part of a pre-inductee investigation.
summary_one_paragraph: This is an agent report dated August 20, 1958, documenting the employment history of Robert Scheer, a pre-inductee, at S. Klein Department Stores. The report, compiled by Special Agent Paul F. Rohde of the 108th CIC Group, details Scheer's role as a stock clerk and cashier in the shoes and charge departments between June and October 1954, noting his salary progression and the reason for his departure (reduction in force). The report also includes Scheer's date and place of birth, his father's name and address, his social security number, the schools he attended, and references.
title: Report of Findings - Agent Report
sender: USA, Paul F. Rohde, 108th CIC Group
